page.title: 04Horticulture in Milnathort
page.content:
The only plant nursery in the block is owned and run by the Telfer family who have owned{Mayfield Nursery}for 44 years. The nursery covers a 5 acre site on the edge of{Milnathort,}and is used for growing produce for sale to the trade - shops and markets. Twenty different kinds of vegetable are grown in addition to a wide range of flowers. Marigold is the most popular flowering plant, and cabbage is the largest-selling vegetable.
A greengrocer and fruiter's business, run by Mr & Mrs Tom Lawrie, Damley's Cottage, 4km from Milnathort, is for retail selling of their own and bought in produce. They grow a number of different vegetables, such as parsnip, cabbage, leeks and lettuce. Their shop "The Fruit Lawrie", is in{Kinross.
